pageContext.claim: “Even during the campaign, people would come up to me -- it's a long time ago -- many decades ago.  Oftentimes they were older.  In some cases, they were younger.  Great-grandfathers.”
pageContext.analysis: It is not credible that great-grandfathers would ask Trump about relatives lost in the Korean war. A parent of someone who served in that conflict would now be approaching 100 years.
